section.title: Valve.VR.ISteamVR_Action_Vector3 Interface Reference

para.para: Boolean actions are either true or false. There is an onStateUp and onStateDown event for the rising and falling edge.

listitem.para: The current float value of the action. Note: Will only return non-zero if the action is also active.
The float value of the action from the previous update. Note: Will only return non-zero if the action is also active.
The float value difference between this update and the previous update. Note: Will only return non-zero if the action is also active.
The float value difference between the previous update and update before that. Note: Will only return non-zero if the action is also active.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Boolean actions are either true or false. There is an onStateUp and onStateDown event for the rising and falling edge.
